## ApiError class

Represents an Error from the Answers API

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ApiError extends Error 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Error

## Remarks

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `ApiError` class.

|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
